metadata.title: Device: How can I program the device in production?

sections.content:
Question:
How can I program the device in production?
Answer:
The device has a serial programming interface that can be used to store any defined application parameters (related to the specific voice recognition keywords, or any other configurable settings) into the device memory.
Suitable Products
RISC-V Voice ASSP
